title: Alex Gerrard enjoys a rare date night with husband Steven
text:
They are proud parent to their four children.

But Steven Gerrard and his wife Alex took time off from parenting duties to enjoy a rare date night in London on Tuesday.

Alex, 36, showed off her modelling credentials as she strutted down the street in sock boots and a £325 Balenciaga T-shirt.

Out on the town: Steven Gerrard and his wife Alex took time off from parenting duties to enjoy a rare date night in London on Tuesday

She teamed the look with ripped denim jeans, a tailored blazer and a silver crocodile print clutch bag.

Alex wore her blonde locks in soft waves and accentuated her fair complexion with a radiant make-up look.

Steven, 39, meanwhile was casually-clad in a dark denim shirt, white T-shirt and trainers.

Stylish display: Alex, 36, showed off her modelling credentials as she strutted down the street in sock boots and a £325 Balenciaga T-shirt

While Alex is a successful model and fashion critic, she also juggles raising their four children with her football manager husband.

The pair have been going from strength to strength since they became a couple in 2002.

They tied the knot in a romantic ceremony in Cliveden House in Buckinghamshire back in June 2007.

Fashion maven: She teamed the look with ripped denim jeans, a tailored blazer and a silver crocodile print clutch bag

Steven and Alex are proud parents to Lilly-Ella, 15, Lexi, aged 13, Lourdes, seven, and Lio, two.

Steven is best known for playing for Liverpool and captaining the England squad, and recently looked back at his time in the sport during an interview with The Daily Mail.

He recalled the moment he was pushed to retire as his body could not longer keep up with the demands of playing for Los Angeles.

But he also explained that he pushes that passion for football into his new role as Rangers manager, where the team are currently performing well at third place in the league.

He said: 'I have to be aware I must control my emotions a lot more. It's not about me now. It was about me when I played. Now the challenge is to get a group as right as I can, using my journey and experiences to help them.'
description: Steven Gerrard and his wife Alex took time off from parenting duties to enjoy a rare date night in London on Tuesday.
